code: import axiosClient from'./axiosClient';const ChatRoomsAPI={getMessageByRoomId:roomId=>{const url="/chatrooms/getById?roomId=".concat(roomId);return axiosClient.get(url);},createNewRoom:()=>{const url="/chatrooms/createNewRoom";return axiosClient.post(url);},addMessage:body=>{const url="/chatrooms/addMessage";return axiosClient.put(url,body);}};export default ChatRoomsAPI;
